/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the soft glow of the overcast sky. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The colors in the image are muted, with shades of gray and green dominating the scene, reflecting the overcast weather conditions. Despite the lack of vibrant hues, the image paints a vivid picture of a day in the life of Beijing.
